application.name: Pandoc
application.summary: A document conversion conversion engine written in Haskell

description.p: Pandoc is a document conversion engine written in Haskell. It can take many different formats and output many other formats.
Useful for writing in one favored format and converting into another format that is readable by others. This may require the use of other applications like LaTeX provided by TexLive or MikTex.
